title: Why am I suddenly seeing increased plays of Katarina, Talon & Rengar?
body:
This just happened over the last few games before & after Patch 6.21, and it can mean a few things:

1) They realized these champions exist after Riot announced the Assassin Update.
2) They're having their last moments with the prework champions.

Or the last, and possibly the dumbest...

3) They thought the Assassin Update is live.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: To maintain what hope I have for humanity, I'm going to assume number two.
I hope it's not the latter and just people getting their last moments with it. xD
personally ima start playing talon a bit  just to get a feel on what he was like before the change goes through

They want to be able to say that they "main" the champion, so that they can later complain that the rework "ruined" them.

This happens basically every time Riot reworks something.

>2) They're having their last moments with the prework champions.

This one.

Also maybe 1) for Talon specifically.
stupid question is only gonna get stupid answers
